description: React component 'ShowDetails' that fetches and displays details of a show, including poster, title, description, seasons, episodes, and provides Play and Back buttons with event handling.

methods.name: ShowDetails
methods.description: React functional component that manages fetching show info, handling user interactions, and rendering the show details overlay.

methods.name: handlePlay
methods.description: Handles the Play button click, calls the play API, and navigates to the URL.
